title: #270 Operation: Dancer In The Dark
itunes:title: #270 Operation: Dancer In The Dark
description:
Nikki is currently on vocal rest and she left this story for Besties to enjoy. She shares her experience going above and beyond to surprise her boyfriend Chris for his birthday. Secret photos, a flight to Europe, conspiring with dancers at a strip club, a pink wig and Australians are all involved in her secret mission. Andrew is hanging on to the edge of his seat by his fissure. Chris Convy also joins to help recap the story. 

While we drop the pod weekly please catch up on past episodes and videos. Xoxo.

------------

Watch this episode on our Youtube Channel: The Nikki Glaser Podcast

Follow the pod on Instagram for bonus content: @NikkiGlaserPod

Leave us your voicemail: Click Here To Record

Get Pod Merch: Podshop.NikkiGlaser.com
